description:
"Ian is an essential part of your internet marketing" Steve Orlow- The Orlow Firm, Former President of the Queens County Bar Assoc.

"Because of Ian and his team, I get called on almost every big case in Denver" Doug Richards, Denver Criminal Defense Attorneys

Are you a lawyer, doctor, dentist, photographer that wants more clients? Internet Marketing is becoming less of a choice and more of a requirement to grow your business. Most "internet marketing" courses are for selling stuff online, not for promoting your real life professional business.

I am going to teach you the 4 essential components to growing your business online. I have helped hundreds and taught 1000s of professionals like yourself how to grow your business online. Whether you are just starting out with internet marketing, or want to improve your presence, these fundamentals will help you get more clients.

authenticWEB, my internet marketing agency, continues to help businesses just like yours, and these are the fundamental techniques we use on a daily basis.

"You don't have to be great to start but you have to start to be great"

-Zig Ziglar
title: The 4 Keys to more clients from Google
